items.sentence: I asked Tom why he had never studied French.
I bought a watch and I lost it the next day.
Let\'s divide this money between you and me.
Let\'s finish this work as soon as possible.
I understand what you\'re trying to tell me.
I wake Tom up every morning at six o\'clock.
Is it true that Tom was in Boston last week?
Is there anything that I can do to help you?
Is there something that you want to tell me?
Is there something that you wish to tell me?
Is there such thing as a truly selfless act?
My parents have just arrived at the station.
My parents persuaded me not to travel alone.
My son always gets sick when he rides a bus.
My wife and I are expecting our first child.
New York State is almost as large as Greece.
Next year my birthday will fall on a Sunday.
This is the camera which I bought yesterday.
This is the very book that I wanted to read.
Don\'t criticize what you can\'t understand.
